text:
On November 1, 2024, Vaughan shared a funny social media post about the mix-up, revealing that security at the event thought his t-shirt, which read ‚Äú[redacted_name] is My Favorite,‚Äù signaled that he was just a big fan of the ‚ÄúMean Girls‚Äù alum.
‚ÄúI thought I was gonna be so clever showing up to the event in this shirt,‚Äù Vaughan wrote. ‚ÄúInstead they mistook me for a fan and initially denied me entry üòÇ.‚Äù
